pages.text: Occultists and Demonolgists may discover the ability of the Brazier to cast Curses upon a target. By burning certain reagents, as well as including a Taglock of the chosen target, from the smoke of the burned objects an unseen force is born, which will hunt down the target and inflict the curse upon them.
Sets up a magic bounce around the target, giving any curses directed at them to instead reflect back to the original one who cursed them.
Randomly gives the target any debuff other than wither or poison. Not constant, randomly occurs for the duration of the curse.
The fires of hell lick at the target, weakening their resistance to heat and flame. Every flame is devouring pyre.
Weakens the target’s flesh, causing it to burn and crack when in the presence of sunlight, like that of a foul undead.
Causes the target’s body to have a must lower tolerance to heat, causing them to randomly catch fire in hot biomes, and they will take more damage from fire and lava.
The target moves slower in water, they sink faster in water, and hostile aquatic creatures deal more damage to them.
Covers the skin of the target in fine metallic flakes of the burned metal nuggets, causing the target to become very conductive.
Blinds all those near the target, along with the target themselves.  Not constant, randomly occurs for the duration of the curse.
Inflicts a painful, magical disease on the target, constantly eating away at their wellbeing until they keel over or get it cleansed.
